content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.a) Describe one cause of Great Britain's early industrialization in the period 1700–1800.b) Describe one effect of Great Britain's industrialization on the European balance of power in the period 1800–1900.c) Explain one political reaction to industrialization within Great Britain in the period 1800–1900.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
